name: Lv.60 Growth Pack
description: Novice Limited Growth Pack (available for use at Lv.60). Open it to receive Zeny x30000, Dish Pack B x1, Old Universal Chest x1, Lightning Chain x2, refining Material Chest II x2, Dead Branch x10.

name: Lv.7 Talent Fruit
description: The fruit of talent tree in Monster Eden. With magical power, the fruit is said to be popular among all monsters. Pets randomly acquire skills above Lv.7 after using the fruit.

name: Lv.70 Autumn Chest
description: Autumn Test Limited Growth Chest (available for use at Lv.70), which contains Zeny x60000, Mora Coin x5, Eden Coin x500, Belief Token x10.

name: Lv.70 Growth Pack
description: Novice Limited Growth Pack (available for use at Lv.70). Open it to receive Zeny x50000, Mora Coin x5, Eden Coin x200, Belief Token x10, Amazing Toy Box x1.

description: The fruit of talent tree in Monster Eden. With magical power, the fruit is said to be popular among all monsters. Pets randomly acquire skills above Lv.8 after using the fruit.

name: Lv.90 Autumn Chest

description: Novice Limited Growth Pack (available for use at Lv.90). Open it to receive Zeny x60000, Fantasy·Silver Bracer x1, Dish Pack B x10, Belief Token x20, Mora Coin x20, Advanced Card Collection x1.
